price: Böylece (Allah, haksızlığa uğrayana yardım edecektir ve buna kadirdir). Çünkü Allah, geceyi gündüze katar, gündüzü geceye katar. Şu da muhakkak ki Allah, hakkıyla işiten ve görendir.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعُۢ بَصِيرٞ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-anna al-laha yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wa-anna al-laha samīʿun baṣīrun
